languages.text: "Хорошо, я и сам искал разговора". {n}Ноздри Соломона раздуваются, взгляд беспокойно скользит по мостику.{/n} "Я должен рассказать о своем прошлом, чтобы окончательно закрыть всю эту ситуацию. Если вы, конечно, захотите выслушать".

"Yes, I've been looking for a chance to have this conversation." {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare, his eyes darting uneasily around the bridge.{/n} "I must tell you something about my past, so that we might consider the matter closed. If you agree to hear me out, that is."
languages.original_text: "Хорошо, я и сам искал разговора". {n}Ноздри Соломона раздуваются, взгляд беспокойно скользит по мостику.{/n} "Я должен рассказать о своем прошлом, чтобы окончательно закрыть всю эту ситуацию. Если вы, конечно, захотите выслушать".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, I've been looking for a chance to have this conversation." {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare, his eyes darting uneasily around the bridge.{/n} "I must tell you something about my past, so that we could consider the matter closed. If you agree to hear me out, that is."

"Yes, I've been looking for a chance to have this conversation." {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare, his eyes darting uneasily around the bridge.{/n} "I must tell you something about my past, so that we might consider the matter closed. If you agree to hear me out, that is."

"Yes, I've been looking for a chance to have this conversation." {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare, his eyes darting uneasily around the bridge.{/n} "I must tell you something about my past, so that we might consider the matter closed. If you agree to hear me out, that is."

languages.text: 「ええ、ずっとその話をする機会を探していたんです」{n}ソロモーンの鼻孔が広がり、彼の視線は不安げにブリッジをあちこちさまよった。{/n}「過去について話しておきたいことがあります。そうすれば、この件に区切りをつけられるかもしれません。もちろん、あなたが聞いてくださるなら、ですが」
languages.original_text: "Yes, I've been looking for a chance to have this conversation." {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare, his eyes darting uneasily around the bridge.{/n} "I must tell you something about my past, so that we might consider the matter closed. If you agree to hear me out, that is."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、ずっとその話をする機会を探していたんです」{n}ソロモーンの鼻孔が広がり、彼の視線は不安げにブリッジをあちこちさまよった。{/n}「過去について話しておきたいことがあります。そうすれば、この件に区切りをつけられるかもしれません。もちろん、あなたが聞いてくださるなら、ですが」

languages.text: "Ja, auch ich habe eine Gelegenheit herbeigewünscht, um dieses Gespräch zu führen." {n}Solomornes Nasenflügel beben, sein Blick wandert unruhig über die Brücke.{/n} "Ich muss Euch etwas über meine Vergangenheit erzählen, damit wir die Sache abschließen können. Natürlich nur, wenn Ihr einverstanden seid, mir zuzuhören."
languages.original_text: "Yes, I've been looking for a chance to have this conversation." {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare, his eyes darting uneasily around the bridge.{/n} "I must tell you something about my past, so that we might consider the matter closed. If you agree to hear me out, that is."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, auch ich habe eine Gelegenheit herbeigewünscht, um dieses Gespräch zu führen." {n}Solomornes Nasenflügel beben, sein Blick wandert unruhig über die Brücke.{/n} "Ich muss Euch etwas über meine Vergangenheit erzählen, damit wir die Sache abschließen können. Natürlich nur, wenn Ihr einverstanden seid, mir zuzuhören."

languages.text: « Certainement. Je souhaitais également en discuter avec vous. » {n}Les narines de Solomorne frémissent tandis qu'il balaie d'un regard nerveux la passerelle.{/n} « J'aimerais vous parler de mon passé, pour que nous puissions considérer ce sujet clos. Si vous acceptez d'en parler, évidemment. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, I've been looking for a chance to have this conversation." {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare, his eyes darting uneasily around the bridge.{/n} "I must tell you something about my past, so that we might consider the matter closed. If you agree to hear me out, that is."

traits.locale_text: « Certainement. Je souhaitais également en discuter avec vous. » {n}Les narines de Solomorne frémissent tandis qu'il balaie d'un regard nerveux la passerelle.{/n} « J'aimerais vous parler de mon passé, pour que nous puissions considérer ce sujet clos. Si vous acceptez d'en parler, évidemment. »

languages.text: «Sí, estaba esperando una oportunidad para tener esta conversación». {n}Solomorne ensancha las fosas nasales y lanza una mirada intranquila en torno al puente.{/n} «Debo confesarle algo de mi pasado, para que podamos dar por zanjado el asunto. Si tiene a bien escucharme, claro está».
languages.original_text: "Yes, I've been looking for a chance to have this conversation." {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare, his eyes darting uneasily around the bridge.{/n} "I must tell you something about my past, so that we might consider the matter closed. If you agree to hear me out, that is."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, estaba esperando una oportunidad para tener esta conversación». {n}Solomorne ensancha las fosas nasales y lanza una mirada intranquila en torno al puente.{/n} «Debo confesarle algo de mi pasado, para que podamos dar por zanjado el asunto. Si tiene a bien escucharme, claro está».

languages.text: “是啊，我一直希望能有机会和你谈谈这件事情。”{n}索罗蒙撑大了鼻孔，目光紧张不安，在舰桥上扫来扫去。{/n}“我必须和你说说我过去的事情，这样一来，这件事就可以算是结束了。当然，假如你愿意听我说这些的话。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, I've been looking for a chance to have this conversation." {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare, his eyes darting uneasily around the bridge.{/n} "I must tell you something about my past, so that we might consider the matter closed. If you agree to hear me out, that is."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，我一直希望能有机会和你谈谈这件事情。”{n}索罗蒙撑大了鼻孔，目光紧张不安，在舰桥上扫来扫去。{/n}“我必须和你说说我过去的事情，这样一来，这件事就可以算是结束了。当然，假如你愿意听我说这些的话。”

languages.text: "Evet, ben de bu konuyu konuşmak için fırsat kolluyordum." {n}Solomorne'un burun delikleri genişliyor, gözleri köprüde tedirgince geziniyor.{/n} "Size geçmişim hakkında bir şey anlatmam gerekiyor. Böylece bu konuyu kapanmış sayabiliriz. Beni dinlemeyi kabul ederseniz tabii."
languages.original_text: "Yes, I've been looking for a chance to have this conversation." {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare, his eyes darting uneasily around the bridge.{/n} "I must tell you something about my past, so that we might consider the matter closed. If you agree to hear me out, that is."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, ben de bu konuyu konuşmak için fırsat kolluyordum." {n}Solomorne'un burun delikleri genişliyor, gözleri köprüde tedirgince geziniyor.{/n} "Size geçmişim hakkında bir şey anlatmam gerekiyor. Böylece bu konuyu kapanmış sayabiliriz. Beni dinlemeyi kabul ederseniz tabii."

languages.original_text: "Yes, I've been looking for a chance to have this conversation." {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare, his eyes darting uneasily around the bridge.{/n} "I must tell you something about my past, so that we might consider the matter closed. If you agree to hear me out, that is."
